ratings.comment: He's probably a cool guy but class was extremely disorganized. He gave us a week-by-week class schedule in the syllabus that seemed to mean absolutely nothing. Still, I didn't do homework assignments and my attendance was awful, and I ended up with an AB. (I'm not even sure he noticed.)

I thought Courtney was just great!  His classes were really interesting as long as you joined the discussion.  Also, he truly took an interest in everyone's ideas and opinions.  Also a very smart guy!
this class wa sa joke, and i only went about 1/2 the time, but i ended up getting an AB with almost no effort.

He is SO unorganized and never tells us what we're supposed to turn in or just read.  Forgets to assign things, takes forever to hand stuff back, and his accent sucks.  But, if you go to his office hours he's really nice and helpful.
Very helpful outside of class, but in class I thought he was disorganized and hard to learn from.  I don't recommend taking his classes.
Very unorganized and gets papers and tests back really late. Hard to understand with his accent. He cares about his students, and is very helpful in office hours.

horrible professor!  He is so unorganized and does not do a good job teaching.  It took him 2 months to grade a 2 pg paper!! I don't think I learned a single thing from him this semester.  Please do yourself a favor, and do not take a class from him!
Courtney is by far the WORST spanish teacher in the spanish department.  He is so unhelpful, unorganized, and can barely speak Spanish himself.  AVOID HIS CLASS LIKE THE PLAGUE!
His accent SUCKS...he speaks Spanish worse than I do...how am I supposed to learn anything from him?

He's a really sweet guy, and he cares about his students. He has his own set ideas about interpreting texts, but they are valid and interesting. Do the homework and readings and the tests/quizzes should go well for you.
Good teacher, very helpful.  Easy to understand!!  2nd time in his class (by choice).
Great teacher overall.  Helpful.  Clear.  Precise.
Courtney is in love with his own ideas, but those ideas are generally interesting :) Not an amazing teacher, but if you know what you're doing, it can be a really great class.
